casebody.data:
Francisco Munoz v. Richard Surface Construction Company et al. (9901)

Dupont, C. J., Norcott and Landau, Js.

Argued March 26 decision released April 14, 1992 Kevin J. Maher, with whom, on the brief, was Maureen E. Driscoll, for the appellant (named defendant et al.). Christopher B. Carveth, for the appellee (plaintiff). Robin L. Wilson, assistant attorney general, with whom were Robert W. Murphy, assistant attorney general, and, on the brief, Richard Blumenthal, attorney general, and Charles A. Overend, assistant attorney general, for the appellee (defendant Second Injury and Compensation Assurance Fund). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
